description: Internal alterations, installation of lift and new staircase. Alterations to front elevation to install full height glazed screen and double doors.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed alterations to the frontage and internal plan form, would be harmful to the design and appearance of this listed building, and harmful to the character and appearance of the Clerkenwell Green Conservation Area contrary to policy Planning Policy Statement 5- Planning for the Historic Environment; policies 7.4, 7.6 and  7.8 of the London Plan 2011, Strategic policies CS7, CS8 and CS9 of Islingtonâ€™s Core Strategy 2011 and policies D4 and D11,  of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and guidance contained within the Conservation Area Design Guidelines 2002 and Islington Urban Design Guide 2006.
